title: The JUNGLE Book
body_text:
Additional Highlights & Notes ...
- Crab walk opening rush
and
opposite throwing-arm game
- Two games of classic two-team dodgeball, four games of prison ball, two games of unlimited team regeneration, and one special game of teammate regeneration via rim (courtesy Justin Wolf)
Special Thanks To The Following ...
- Lauren Stopa and Justin Pierce for the brand new dodgeballs
- Kevin Fitzpatrick for the air pump and radio
- Zach Katz and Alex Brummel for the large cooler of drinks
- Gail Adams for the assortment of food
- Christopher Adams who greatly helped organize this memorable event
Thanks to everyone who made our first ECD Reunion event a real success!
body_html:
Additional Highlights & Notes ...
- Crab walk opening rush and opposite throwing-arm game
- Two games of classic two-team dodgeball, four games of prison ball, two games of unlimited team regeneration, and one special game of teammate regeneration via rim (courtesy Justin Wolf)

Special Thanks To The Following ...
- Lauren Stopa and Justin Pierce for the brand new dodgeballs
- Kevin Fitzpatrick for the air pump and radio
- Zach Katz and Alex Brummel for the large cooler of drinks
- Gail Adams for the assortment of food
- Christopher Adams who greatly helped organize this memorable event

Thanks to everyone who made our first ECD Reunion event a real success!
